title: Casual and friendly peeps to play with (norms)
body:
Good day my friends, uhhhhhh just lookin for some friendly peeps to play with me and a couple other buddies of mine in norms. I plan to play ranked next season and I'm currently unranked simply because I didn't ranked this season.

I'll usually be playing in the evening. If I'm on in the day time, I'll most likely be playing customs testing out champs.

For a bit of background, usually play Jungle but I don't mind playing any other role. In terms of Jungling, I've mainly focused on Trundle & Udyr right now and plan to play some other junglers at some point.

If you guys want to add me, username is Park Chanyeol (or Tundradragon if that doesn't work) and add me on Discord for communicating (Tundradragon#6401). Thanks guys :D and hope you have a great day

P.S If you get my K-Pop reference, you're a legend :D

replies.body: you like exo?? i havent listened to k-pop in a few years im still hung up about old shinee :L i gave you an add maybe ill see you on the rift sometime x
